cross.io.csv
Class CSVWriter

java.lang.Object
  cross.io.csv.CSVWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IWorkflowElement, IXMLSerializable
public class CSVWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWorkflowElement

Provides various methods to write arrays and other data to csv files.

Author:
Nils.Hoffmann@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de
